documents.content:
# California Regional Water Quality Control Boards Directory (2026)

## Overview

California has 9 Regional Water Quality Control Boards that implement water quality standards and issue permits within their geographic areas.

## [State Water Resources Control Board](https://www.waterboards.ca.gov/about_us/contact_us/rwqcbs_directory.html) (Headquarters)

**Address:** 1001 I Street, Sacramento, CA 95814
**Mailing:** P.O. Box 100, Sacramento, CA 95812-0100
**Phone:** (916) 327-9978
**Email:** Via online contact form

### Specialized Contact Numbers
| Division | Phone |
|----------|-------|
| Drinking Water | (916) 449-5577 |
| Water Quality | (916) 341-5455 |
| Water Rights | (916) 341-5300 |
| Financial Assistance | (916) 341-5700 |

---

## Region 1: [North Coast](https://www.waterboards.ca.gov/northcoast/)
**Coverage:** Del Norte, Humboldt, Mendocino, Trinity, and portions of Glenn, Lake, Siskiyou, Sonoma counties

**Address:** 5550 Skylane Blvd, Suite A, Santa Rosa, CA 95403
**Phone:** (707) 576-2220
**Fax:** (707) 523-0135
**Email:** NorthCoast@waterboards.ca.gov

---

## Region 2: [San Francisco Bay](https://www.waterboards.ca.gov/sanfranciscobay/)
**Coverage:** Nine Bay Area counties: Alameda, Contra Costa, Marin, Napa, San Francisco, San Mateo, Santa Clara, Solano, Sonoma

**Address:** 1515 Clay Street, Suite 1400, Oakland, CA 94612
**Phone:** (510) 622-2300
**Fax:** (510) 622-2460
**Email:** rb2-sfbay-contactus@waterboards.ca.gov

---

## Region 3: [Central Coast](https://www.waterboards.ca.gov/centralcoast/)
**Coverage:** Monterey, San Benito, San Luis Obispo, Santa Barbara, Santa Cruz, and portion of Ventura counties

**Address:** 895 Aerovista Place, Suite 101, San Luis Obispo, CA 93401
**Phone:** (805) 549-3147
**Fax:** (805) 543-0397
**Email:** centralcoast@waterboards.ca.gov

---

## Region 4: [Los Angeles](https://www.waterboards.ca.gov/losangeles/)
**Coverage:** Los Angeles and Ventura counties (except Antelope Valley)

**Address:** 320 West 4th Street, Suite 200, Los Angeles, CA 90013
**Phone:** (213) 576-6600
**Fax:** (213) 576-6640
**Email:** info4@waterboards.ca.gov

---

## Region 5: [Central Valley](https://www.waterboards.ca.gov/centralvalley/)
**Coverage:** Sacramento and San Joaquin River basins, Tulare Lake Basin

**Main Office:** 11020 Sun Center Drive, Suite 200, Rancho Cordova, CA 95670
**Phone:** (916) 464-3291
**Fax:** (916) 464-4645
**Email:** info5@waterboards.ca.gov

**Fresno Branch:** 1685 E Street, Fresno, CA 93706
**Phone:** (559) 445-5116

**Redding Branch:** 364 Knollcrest Drive, Suite 205, Redding, CA 96002
**Phone:** (530) 224-4845

---

## Region 6: [Lahontan](https://www.waterboards.ca.gov/lahontan/)
**Coverage:** Eastern Sierra, high desert, portions of Inyo, Mono, Alpine, and other counties east of Sierra Crest

**Main Office:** 2501 Lake Tahoe Blvd, South Lake Tahoe, CA 96150
**Phone:** (530) 542-5400
**Fax:** (530) 544-2271
**Email:** lahontan@waterboards.ca.gov

**Victorville Branch:** 15095 Amargosa Road, Building 2, Suite 210, Victorville, CA 92394
**Phone:** (760) 241-6583

---

## Region 7: [Colorado River Basin](https://www.waterboards.ca.gov/coloradoriver/)
**Coverage:** Imperial, Riverside (desert portion), San Bernardino (desert portion), San Diego (desert portion)

**Address:** 73-720 Fred Waring Drive, Suite 100, Palm Desert, CA 92260
**Phone:** (760) 346-7491
**Fax:** (760) 341-6820
**Email:** info7@waterboards.ca.gov

---

## Region 8: [Santa Ana](https://www.waterboards.ca.gov/santaana/)
**Coverage:** Orange County, western Riverside, western San Bernardino, portions of Los Angeles County

**Address:** 3737 Main Street, Suite 500, Riverside, CA 92501-3348
**Phone:** (951) 782-4130
**Fax:** (951) 781-6288
**Email:** Region8Info@waterboards.ca.gov

---

## Region 9: [San Diego](https://www.waterboards.ca.gov/sandiego/)
**Coverage:** San Diego County, portions of Orange and Riverside counties

**Address:** 2375 Northside Drive, Suite 100, San Diego, CA 92108
**Phone:** (619) 516-1990
**Fax:** (619) 516-1994
**Email:** rb9_questions@waterboards.ca.gov

---

## Find Your Region

**Interactive Map:** [Find Your Regional Board](https://www.waterboards.ca.gov/waterboards_map.html)

## Take Action

1. **Find your Regional Board** using the [interactive waterboards map](https://www.waterboards.ca.gov/waterboards_map.html) — enter your address to identify which of the 9 regional boards has jurisdiction over your area.
2. **Visit your region's homepage** — click the links above for direct access to your board's meeting schedules, permits, programs, and staff contacts.
3. **Check the full directory** at the [SWRCB Regional Board Directory](https://www.waterboards.ca.gov/about_us/contact_us/rwqcbs_directory.html) for additional contact details including fax numbers and mailing addresses.
4. **Subscribe to updates** from your Regional Board to receive meeting notices, permit actions, and policy updates by email.
